snippet: Donald Caplin and Zachary Grossack won the 0 to 5,000 Life Master Pairs at the Summer North American Championships in Philadelphia in July.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played in the Life Master Pairs at the Summer North American Championships in Philadelphia.
lead_paragraph: Donald Caplin and Zachary Grossack won the 0 to 5,000 Life Master Pairs at the Summer North American Championships in Philadelphia in July.

headline.seo: In Bridge, a Deal From 0 to 5,000 Life Master Pairs
headline.main: Winners at the 0 to 5,000 Life Master Pairs
